entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 12 except minus 15 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12 except minus 15 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
